tools/edgeStats.c

00037 /**
00038  * \file edgeStats.c
00039  * \brief Report edge length statistics on a dataset
00040  *
00041  * $Source: /home/Repositories/fcdmf/fclib/tools/edgeStats.c,v $
00042  * $Revision: 1.22 $ 
00043  * $Date: 2006/11/07 23:49:03 $
00044  *
00045  * \description
00046  *    Usage: edgeStats [options] dataset [mesh_name]
00047  *
00048  *    Reports edge length statistics. If a mesh is given, it reports
00049  *    the stats for only that mesh, otherwise it reports stats for
00050  *    all meshes.
00051  *
00052  * \todo ?Add a flag to get overall average of edges?
00053  *
00054  * \modifications
00055  *   - 04/20/04 WSK, created.
00056  */
00057 
00058 #include <string.h>
00059 #include "fc.h"
00060  
00061 //  pretty output depends on var already being checked to be a valid
00062 // displacement variable
00063 static void get_and_print_lengths(FC_Mesh mesh, FC_Variable var,
00064                       char* message) {
00065   FC_ReturnCode rc;
00066   FC_Variable lengths;
00067   double min, max, ave, stdev;
00068 
00069   printf("    %s\n", message);
00070   fflush(NULL);
00071 
00072   // get lengths  
00073   if (FC_HANDLE_EQUIV(var, FC_NULL_VARIABLE))
00074     rc = fc_getEdgeLengths(mesh, &lengths);
00075   else
00076     rc = fc_getDisplacedEdgeLengths(mesh, var, &lengths);
00077   if (rc != FC_SUCCESS) {
00078     printf("        Failed to get edge lengths\n");
00079     fflush(NULL);
00080     return;
00081   }
00082 
00083   // do stats
00084   rc = fc_getVariableMinMax(lengths, &min, NULL, &max, NULL);
00085   if (rc == FC_SUCCESS) {
00086     printf("        min = %g\n", min);
00087     printf("        max = %g\n", max);
00088   }
00089   else 
00090     printf("        Failed to get min/max lengths\n");
00091   fflush(NULL);
00092   rc = fc_getVariableMeanSdev(lengths, &ave, &stdev);
00093   if (rc == FC_SUCCESS) 
00094     printf("        ave = %g +/- %g\n", ave, stdev);
00095   else
00096     printf("        Failed to get mean/stdev lengths\n");
00097   fflush(NULL);
00098 
00099   // cleanup
00100   fc_deleteVariable(lengths);
00101 
00102   return;
00103 }
00104 
00105 int main(int argc, char** argv) {
00106   FC_ReturnCode rc;
00107   int i, j;
00108   int numMesh, numElem, numEdge, *numSteps;
00109   FC_Dataset ds;
00110   FC_Mesh *meshes;
00111   FC_Variable *displs, **seqDispls;   
00112   char* file_name = NULL;
00113   char* mesh_name = NULL;
00114   char* displ_name = NULL;
00115   char message_buf[1028];
00116   FC_VerbosityLevel verbose_level = FC_QUIET;
00117   int doOnlyOne = 0; // flag for whether to do one (1) or all (0);
00118   FC_ElementType elemType;
00119   int doDispl = 0;
00120   int* foundDispls, *foundSeqDispls, numNoDispl;
00121 
00122   // handle arguments
00123   if (argc < 2) {
00124   usage:
00125     printf("usage: %s [options] dataset [mesh_name]\n", argv[0]);
00126     printf("options: \n");
00127     printf("   -d var_name   : calc the displaced values using this displacement\n");
00128     printf("                   variable\n");
00129     printf("   -h            : print this help message\n");
00130     printf("   -v            : print warning and error messages\n");   
00131     printf("   -v            : print log and error messages\n");   
00132     printf("\n");
00133     printf("Prints summary of edge lengths on meshes in the dataset.\n");
00134     printf("If a mesh name is provided, prints only a summary for that "
00135            "mesh.\n");
00136     fflush(NULL);
00137     exit(-1);
00138   }
00139   for (i = 1; i < argc; i++) {
00140     if (!strcmp(argv[i], "-d")) {
00141       doDispl = 1;
00142       i++;
00143       displ_name = argv[i];
00144     }
00145     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "-v")) {
00146       verbose_level = FC_WARNING_MESSAGES;
00147     }
00148     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "-V")) {
00149       verbose_level = FC_LOG_MESSAGES;
00150     }
00151     else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "-h", 2) || !strncmp(argv[i], "-", 1))
00152       goto usage;
00153     else {
00154       file_name = argv[i];
00155       if (i+1 < argc) {
00156         i++;
00157         doOnlyOne = 1;
00158         mesh_name = argv[i];
00159       }
00160     }
00161   }
00162   if (!file_name)
00163     goto usage;
00164 
00165   // init library and load dataset
00166   rc = fc_setLibraryVerbosity(verbose_level);
00167   fc_exitIfError(rc);
00168   rc = fc_initLibrary();
00169   fc_exitIfError(rc);
00170   rc = fc_loadDataset(file_name, &ds);
00171   fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "Failed to load dataset '%s'", file_name);
00172 
00173   // Get number of meshes and mesh names
00174   if (doOnlyOne) {
00175     int numReturnMeshes;
00176     FC_Mesh *returnMeshes;
00177 
00178     numMesh = 1;
00179     meshes = malloc(sizeof(FC_Mesh));
00180     rc = fc_getMeshByName(ds, mesh_name, &numReturnMeshes,&returnMeshes);
00181     fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc,"Failed to get mesh by name");
00182     if (numReturnMeshes != 1){
00183       fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(FC_INPUT_ERROR, "Failed to find (unique) mesh '%s' - found %d matches",
00184              mesh_name,numReturnMeshes);
00185     }
00186     meshes[0] = returnMeshes[0];
00187     free(returnMeshes);
00188   }
00189   else {
00190     rc = fc_getMeshes(ds, &numMesh, &meshes);
00191     fc_exitIfError(rc);
00192   }
00193 
00194   // header
00195   printf("Edge length summary for dataset '%s'\n", file_name);
00196   fflush(NULL);
00197   if (numMesh < 0) {
00198     printf("No meshes were found\n");
00199     fflush(NULL);
00200     exit(0);
00201   }
00202   else 
00203     printf("%d meshes\n", numMesh);
00204   fflush(NULL);
00205 
00206   // if displacing, make sure we have displacement variables
00207   if (doDispl) {
00208     foundDispls = (int*)malloc(numMesh*sizeof(int));
00209     foundSeqDispls = (int*)malloc(numMesh*sizeof(int));
00210     displs = (FC_Variable*)malloc(numMesh*sizeof(FC_Variable));
00211     numSteps = (int*)malloc(numMesh*sizeof(int));
00212     seqDispls = (FC_Variable**)malloc(numMesh*sizeof(FC_Variable*));
00213     if (!foundDispls || !foundSeqDispls || !displs || !seqDispls ||
00214      ! numSteps)
00215       fc_exitIfError(FC_MEMORY_ERROR);
00216               
00217     // try to get handles to vars
00218     numNoDispl = 0;
00219     for (i = 0; i < numMesh; i++) {
00220       foundDispls[i] = 0;
00221       foundSeqDispls[i] = 0;
00222 
00223       rc = fc_getOrGenerateUniqueVariableByName(meshes[i], displ_name,
00224                               &displs[i]);
00225       fc_exitIfError(rc);                              
00226       if (fc_isValidDisplacementVariable(meshes[i], displs[i])) 
00227      foundDispls[i] = 1;
00228 
00229       rc = fc_getOrGenerateUniqueSeqVariableByName(meshes[i], displ_name,
00230                                  &numSteps[i], 
00231                                  &seqDispls[i]);
00232       fc_exitIfError(rc);                              
00233       if (seqDispls[i] && 
00234        fc_isValidDisplacementVariable(meshes[i], seqDispls[i][0]))
00235      foundSeqDispls[i] = 1;
00236 
00237       if (foundDispls[i] + foundSeqDispls[i] == 0) 
00238      numNoDispl++;
00239     }
00240 
00241 
00242     // check
00243     if (numNoDispl == numMesh) {
00244       fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(FC_ERROR, "Displacement variable '%s' was not found",
00245                   displ_name);
00246     }
00247     else if (numNoDispl > 0) {
00248       int first = 1;
00249       printf("WARNING: the displacement variable does not exist on meshes ");
00250       first = 0;
00251       for (i = 0; i < numMesh; i++) {
00252      if (foundDispls[i] + foundSeqDispls[i] == 0) {
00253        if (first)
00254          printf("%d", i);
00255        else
00256          printf(", %d", i);
00257      }
00258       }
00259       printf("\n");
00260     }
00261   }
00262 
00263   // loop over meshes
00264   for (i = 0; i < numMesh; i++) {
00265 
00266     // describe mesh
00267     rc = fc_getMeshName(meshes[i], &mesh_name);
00268     rc = fc_getMeshInfo(meshes[i], NULL, NULL, NULL, &numElem, &elemType);
00269     rc = fc_getMeshNumEdge(meshes[i], &numEdge);
00270     fc_exitIfError(rc);
00271 
00272     // print mesh info
00273     printf("\n");
00274     printf("Mesh %d: '%s'\n", i, mesh_name);
00275     free(mesh_name);
00276     printf("    numElement = %d,  elemType = %s\n", numElem,
00277            fc_getElementTypeText(elemType));
00278     printf("    numEdge = %d\n", numEdge);
00279     fflush(NULL);
00280  
00281     // analyze edges, if any
00282     if (numEdge > 0) {
00283       if (!doDispl)
00284      get_and_print_lengths(meshes[i], FC_NULL_VARIABLE, "Edge lengths:");
00285       else {
00286      // do basic var
00287      if (foundDispls[i])
00288        get_and_print_lengths(meshes[i], displs[i], "Displaced edge lengths:");
00289 
00290      // do a seq variable     
00291      if (foundSeqDispls[i]) {
00292        for (j = 0; j < numSteps[i]; j++) {
00293          sprintf(message_buf, "Displaced edge lengths for step %d", j);
00294          get_and_print_lengths(meshes[i], seqDispls[i][j], message_buf);
00295        }
00296      }
00297      
00298      // didn't find one
00299      if (foundDispls[i] + foundSeqDispls[i] == 0) {
00300        printf("    (Displacement var not found, cannot calc edge lengths)\n");
00301        fflush(NULL);
00302      }
00303       }
00304     }
00305 
00306     fc_deleteMesh(meshes[i]);
00307   }
00308 
00309   // cleanup
00310   if (doDispl) {
00311     free(foundDispls);
00312     free(foundSeqDispls);
00313     for (i = 0; i < numMesh; i++){
00314       free(seqDispls[i]); //dont delete the var
00315     }
00316     free(seqDispls);
00317     free(numSteps);
00318     free(displs);
00319   }
00320 
00321   // shut down
00322   fc_deleteDataset(ds);
00323   fc_finalLibrary();
00324 
00325   exit(0);
00326 }
Generated on Mon Oct 27 13:25:50 2008 for FCLib by  1.5.5
